body_html:
Just to update this this ticket in case others come here looking for Warp CTC integration.

The Warp CTC maintainers have released a tensorflow binding which works transparently with proprocess_collapse_repeated=False and ctc_merge_repeated=True.

I've tested this with Tensorflow 0.12.0 and got good results, though the speed improvement was marginal in my case.

https://github.com/baidu-research/warp-ctc/tree/master/tensorflow_binding

body:
Just to update this this ticket in case others come here looking for Warp CTC integration.

The Warp CTC maintainers have released a tensorflow binding which works transparently with `proprocess_collapse_repeated=False` and `ctc_merge_repeated=True`. 

I've tested this with Tensorflow 0.12.0 and got good results, though the speed improvement was marginal in my case.

https://github.com/baidu-research/warp-ctc/tree/master/tensorflow_binding
